title: Rok's Portfolio
description: Welcome to my portfolio! I'm a fullstack developer with a passion for creating beautiful and efficient websites and applications.

page.title: <blue>Fullstack</blue> Developer <blue>creative</blue> and <blue>efficient</blue>!
page.description: Hey, how's it going? My name is <white>Pedro Lucas</white>, but you can call me <white>Rok</white>. I've been programming since 2019, and it's been my passion ever since. I have a total of <blue><waka></waka></blue> of programming under my belt. I'm pursuing a degree in <white>Computer Science</white> at <white>UFES</white>, worked with prominent Brazilian YouTubers, and currently, I'm part of the <blue><authentic></authentic></blue> team.

my-site.title: My site
my-site.description: My personal website, made with Next JS, Tailwind and Typescript. It's a simple website, but it's a good example of my work.
